arts.ttl: Serie A Liveblog: Milan vs. Lazio, Roma vs. Como, Bologna vs. Cagliari, Genoa vs. Empoli
Bologna take on Cagliari to keep the dream alive
arts.sum: With his goal against Milan, Dan Ndoye became Bologna`s top scorer in Serie A home games this season (five goals, out of six total); indeed, the Swiss player has scored three goals in his last two home league games, one more than than in his previous 27 matches played at Dall`Ara in the league. Bologna have remained unbeaten in their last 11 home games against Cagliari in Serie A (W8 D3), winning eachof the most recent three; the last win for the Sardinians at the Dall`Ara against the Emilians in the tournament dates back to 10 January 2010 (1-0 with a goal by Alessandro Matri, under Massimiliano Allegri).
